Home.findClothes: FIND CLOTHES THAT MATCHES YOUR STYLE
Home.contentDesc: Browse through our diverse range of meticulously crafted garments, designed to bring out your individuality and cater to your sense of style.

Footer.desc: We have clothes that suits your style and which you're proud to wear. From women to men.
Footer.stayup: STAY UP TO DATE ABOUT OUR LATEST OFFERS

Header.content: Sign up and get 20% off all your orders.

ProductDetail.question1: What is the fabric quality of this product?
ProductDetail.answer1: This product is made of 100% cotton fabric.
ProductDetail.question2: What are the return conditions of this product?
ProductDetail.answer2: The return of this product can be made within 30 days.
ProductDetail.question3: What is the size of this product?
ProductDetail.answer3: The size of this product is a bit larger than normal sizes.
ProductDetail.question4: What are the washing instructions of this product?
ProductDetail.answer4: This product can be washed at 30 degrees.
ProductDetail.question5: What are the colors of this product?
ProductDetail.answer5: The color options of this product are blue, black and white.
